snippet: The day after Bill Clinton forcefully made the case for the president's re-election, a new Romney ad notes Mr. Clinton's reaction to Barack Obama was once "Give me a break."
abstract: The day after Bill Clinton forcefully made the case for the president's re-election, a new Romney ad notes Mr. Clinton's reaction to Barack Obama was once "Give me a break."

headline.main: Clinton Was Not Always an Obama Fan, Romney Ad Recalls
headline.print_headline: The Ad Campaign: Recalling a Less Friendly Time
